description: Change of use from offices to 4 one-bedroom flats with associated external alternations (Prior Notification under Class MA of Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 as amended).
decision_conditions: Insufficient information has been submitted to enable the Local Planning Authority to establish whether the building has been vacant for a continuous period of at least 3 months immediately prior to the date of the application for prior approval. The proposal therefore fails to comply with provision MA.1.(1)(a) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and County Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed development would involve external changes to the property, including fenestration changes, new entrance doors, the removal of a chimney stack and removal of an external stair case.  The proposed external changes would fall outside of the remit of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The proposed development would fenestration changes to the building. Given that external changes do not fall within the remit of Class MA, the proposed new windows cannot be considered as part of this prior application. The proposal fails to demonstrate that an adequate provision of natural light in all the habitable rooms of the proposed flats based on the existing window arrangement. The proposal would therefore contrary to the requirement of provision MA.2.-(2)(f) of Class MA, Part 3, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
